oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural products; Arab Revolt, 1936-1939; Balfour Declaration,1917; British colonialism; British policy; Childhood; Customs and traditions; Farmers; Fathers; Haifa (Palestine); Maginot Line; Means of transportation; Migration; Nimrīn (Palestine); Palestinian-Jewish relations; Qurʼānic teaching; Rural life; Schools; Socio-economic conditions; Water resources; World War, 1914-1918; al-Shajarah Battle, 1948; Arab Revolt, 1936-1939; Arbitration; British colonialism; British-Jewish relations; Emotions; Expulsion from Palestine; Families; Hitler, Adolf, 1889-1945; Jewish settlements; Land appropriation; Land sale; Neighboring villages; Ottoman Rule of Palestine, 1876-1918; Prisons; Return; Routes; Socio-economic conditions; World War, 1939-1945; Zionist Invasion of Palestine,1948
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on April 1,2006 with Aḥmad ‘Abd al-Mu‘ṭī, male, born in 1925 in Nimrīn, Palestine and resides in ‘Ayn al-Ḥilwah Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع أحمد عبد المعطي في 1 نيسان أبريل عام 2006، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في نمرين، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Social and political dynamics in the village during the British Mandate. (@ 0:09)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الديناميات الاجتماعية والسياسية في القرية تحت الانتداب البريطاني. (@ 0:09)
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Political conditions in Nimrīn during the zionist occupation and the expulsion to Lebanon . (@ 21:44)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الظروف السياسية في نمرين أثناء الاحتلال الصهيوني والطرد إلى لبنان. (@ 21:44)
